name: SpaceBoy 2D
description:
-SpaceBoy2D- 

Simple Game i did little changes kind of similar of tutorial ,fun and simple to play 

Includes 

  • 3 Different levels 
  • Custom Portal + Scripts
  • Music
  • Collectables score

Proposed Modifications:

  • New TileMaps to Create more uniqe levels
  • Create huge monster as a boss
  • Make New Skilles + Power for the character
  • Create more custom scripts make it more fun to play
  • change the player avatar look + customize
